mng: to force, to compel, to approach or go towards, urgent, pressing
variant of 迫[po4], to persecute, to oppress, embarrassed

exm.mng: poverty-stricken, very poor, hard-pressed, in a predicament, embarrassed
pressing in on one's eyelashes (idiom); imminent
to coerce, to compel, to force
to oppress, to repress, to constrict, oppression, stress (physics)
to have no alternative (idiom); compelled by circumstances, forced into sth
